Fremont.Fremont station (BART):
Fremont is a Bay Area Rapid Transit station that serves Fremont, California. The station was the terminus of the Fremont-Richmond and Fremont-Daly City lines from 1972 until March 25, 2017, when Warm Springs/South Fremont station opened.


== History ==

Service at the station began on September 11, 1972.
